mapper.select: SELECT sale.SALESMANID AS salesmanId, sale.SALESMANNAME AS salesmanName, sale.SALESMANDESCRIPTION AS salesmanDescription, sale.UNIQUEID AS uniqueId, DATE_FORMAT(sale.CREATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(sale.UPDATEDATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS updateDate FROM SALESMAN sale WHERE 1 = 1 AND sale.SALESMANID = ${salesmanId}
